andromeda.why: Holds sovereign knowing—doesn’t outsource insight to consensus.

arcturus.why: Contain, pace, and test-fit the insight before release.

draco.why: Early ‘genius vs freak’ optics can spark status policing.

orion-dark.why: Grabbing orthodoxy to silence the odd insight.

orion-light.why: Discipline to hold the line until clarity is stable.

pleiades.why: Self-soothing and attunement regulate the pressure to speak.

sirius.why: Private insight consolidation; no transmission yet.

lyra.why: Performance eclipses clarity of the idea.
